Headline: No Trains Between 35th/Archer and Halsted
ShortDescription: Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended between 35th/Archer and Halsted due to debris on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended between 35th/Archer and Halsted due to debris on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Midway and 35th/Archer, and,
  • between the Loop and Halsted, only.

Shuttle buses will be available between 35th/Archer and Halsted to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

This may include the #62 Archer bus.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
